name: Create (or update) an ActiveDEMAND contact from a new Google Sheets spreadsheet row
description:
Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create an ActiveDEMAND contact (or update it if it already exists).

The template uses [this spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/18paoMft5e2PttSTcUlBWR_w-uXnxUo5Za7lTCl9iKGA/edit?usp=sharing).
